title: The Recursive Mind by Michael C Corballis
description:
The Recursive Mind challenges the commonly held notion that language is what makes us uniquely human. 

In this compelling book, Michael Corballis argues that what distinguishes us in the animal kingdom is our capacity for recursion: the ability to embed our thoughts within other thoughts.

Evolutionary psychology.
Human evolution.
Brain -- Evolution.
Language and languages -- Origin.

Genre: Non Fiction | Science | Biology
